body: I encountered the same problem as you. Have you solved it?

not ideal. I hope someone from the Docanno's maker will answer this and
help solve the problem :)

issue.title: Fixed jsonl type error

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
Many users reported that the wrong output occurs during exporting to the jsonl(textlabel) format. I investigated the error and think its because of a typo error in the format.ts file. 

See (#1267) for reference. Maybe also (#1257)

issue.title: Export format jsonl (text label) dosen't work.

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.title: Dataset export only exports numbers and not named text.

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
When i export my labelled dataset, the output only contains numbers and not the text names of the labels. I have used both export options and the outputs are the same. I have tried on mac and PC - the same. I have installed fresh and up-to-date and still the same issue. What am i missing here? I have seen this was a previous issue, but no answer apart from this has been solved. I am using windows 10 and python 3.9.0

thanks

issue.title: Improve upload and download features

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
## Upload

- [x] Support a large file upload
- [x] Support a folder upload
- [x] Support multiple files upload
- [x] Support asynchronous upload
- [x] Enable to show upload progress

## Ingestion

- [x] Support batch import to speed up the process
- [x] Support file validation
- [x] Import as much of the file's content as possible
- [x] Provide feedback on which file and what line is wrong and why.
- [x] Support 90 over encodings
- [x] Support auto encoding detection
- [x] Support saving filename

## File format

- [x] Expand the available formats
- [x] Support for specifying columns for labels and text
- [x] Support for specifying schema of CoNLL(IOB2, IOE2, IOBES, BILOU)
- [x] Support for specifying separator(CSV, CoNLL)

## Download

- [x] Support a large file download
- [x] Support asynchronous download
- [x] Support zip download
- [x] Support JSON download

## Related issues
